title: Long Covid Basics
content:
Similar conditions
Some people experiencing Long COVID symptoms have symptoms similar to those reported by people with
myalgic encephalomyelitis/chronic fatigue syndrome (ME/CFS)
and other poorly understood chronic illnesses that may occur after other infections. These unexplained symptoms or conditions may be misunderstood by healthcare providers, which can result in a delay in diagnosis and people receiving the appropriate care or treatment.
Keep Reading:
Living with Long COVID
